snippet: The Devils will retain the first-round pick in the 2014 draft they forfeited in 2010 for circumventing N.H.L. rules in signing Ilya Kovalchuk. A $3 million fine was also reduced, by half.

headline.main: N.H.L. Reduces Devils’ Penalties Over Kovalchuk Contract
